sources.name: CO2 emissions per capita by nation- CDIAC
sources.description:
Data published by Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center
Data publisher's source Tom Boden and Bob Andres (Oak Ridge National Laboratory); Gregg Marland (Appalachian State University)
Link http://cdiac.ornl.gov/CO2_Emission/
Retrieved 2017-04-24

Data based on per capita carbon emissions converted to per capita carbon dioxide emissions using a conversion factor of 3.67.

variables.name: CO2 emissions per capita by nation- CDIAC
